full_text: Screened by NARA, 7/31/2023 3R$ FINDIAS EUG THREE RUPEES THREE RUPEES % HERING Mek family musper out 8686 TOPAISE AFFIDAVIT In the court of Taluka Magistrate at Bhusawal Maharashtra state India. I ladhe Kashinath Gopaidas age 64 occupation agrulture, Vara residing at Varadsim India, do here by on solemn affirmation state as follows :- 3. That my elder sister ladhe Ayodhabai Gopaldas born at Varadsim India on 18th July 1907 was married in the 1919 at Varadsim India to Lathi Govindram Totaram born at Amoda India on 22nd December 1903. The exact date of marriage in the year 1919, could not be traced, and hence not mentioned. Since her marriage her name is Mrs. Lathi Ayodhabai Govindram. We all brothers and sister used to live with our parents in a joint family in the year 1919. As I was a child of eight years, I had a lot of fun and feast in my elder sister's marriage which I remember even to-day. What has been stated above is quite true and correct to the best of my knowledge, belief and information, in token of which I set my hand below this on 12th June 1975 by signing this affidavit at Bhusawal India. compound to rigiva at Bas 9/16/76 gow
